alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern St. Louis and northwestern Carlton Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 338 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Floodwood, or 18 miles east of Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meadowlands around 355 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cotton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis
